text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Apex Legends. The build quality of the HP Spectre x360 - 13t Home and Entertainment Laptop (Intel Core i7-8565U, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 13.3" Touch  Full HD (1920x1080), Intel UHD 620, Fingerprint, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, Win 10 Home) is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Starfield. The build quality of the HP Spectre x360 - 13t Home and Entertainment Laptop (Intel Core i7-8565U, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 13.3" Touch  Full HD (1920x1080), Intel UHD 620, Fingerprint, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, Win 10 Home) is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The Intel Core i7 in the HP Spectre x360 - 13t Home and Entertainment Laptop (Intel Core i7-8565U, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 13.3" Touch  Full HD (1920x1080), Intel UHD 620, Fingerprint, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, Win 10 Home) is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core i7. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP Spectre x360 - 13t Home and Entertainment Laptop (Intel Core i7-8565U, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 13.3" Touch  Full HD (1920x1080), Intel UHD 620, Fingerprint, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, Win 10 Home)!
